#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stack>
#include<string>
#include<queue>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>
#define pb push_back
#define big long long
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define RFOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i>=b;i--)
#define vi vector<int>
#define vb vector<big>
using namespace std;
int main() {
	big l,t,n,i,j,k,r,temp,m,x,y,z,a,b,c,sig,sum=0;
	vb v;
	big count[500001]={0};
	string s;
	cin>>t;
	
	FOR(k,1,t)
	{
	cin>>n;
	v.clear();
	FOR(i,0,n-1)
	{
	    cin>>temp;
	    v.pb(temp);
	    
	}
	    sort(v.begin(),v.end());
	    cout<<"Case "<<k<<": "<<v[n-1]+v[n-2]+v[n-3]<<endl;

	}
    
	return 0;
}
